name: 𝐊𝐞𝐲𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭
description:
- Game in development -

- Description -

Following the disappearance of their beloved dog during a game of fetch and led by the sound of it’s barks, the protagonist crawls beneath the raised roots of a looming tree, falling into the trap of a strange and bizarre world, entombed below.

Keys to the Heart is a puzzle/dungeon crawler where the player follows the voice of their lost dog after falling into a deep labyrinth of strange puzzles, environments and creatures. 

- Features -

  • diverse puzzles to solve
  • compelling soundtrack
  • purposeful story
  • interactable environments
  • intriguing regions to explore

- Controls -

Arrow keys control the player

  • ←↑↓→

Spacebar to interact

  • [           ]

- Download Instructions -

  • Download the zip file, extract all and then run the file.
  • On Windows 10, a "Windows protected your PC" message may pop up. If so, just click "More info" and "Run anyway".
